philosophy.eukaryotic_model: memory/ is a Hybrid Eukaryotic Repository. It is an Object container for its leaf-passthrough (public/ or private/) and a Subject for its comms/ logs. The entire directory is the Google Drive sync layer.
philosophy.type_attribution: The root memory/ directory follows the same type-attribution rules as public/ (e.g., json/, md/, py/, webm/).
philosophy.exclusive_leaf: A memory/ repo may contain public/ OR private/, but never both. Dual existence is DEPRECATED.
